abstract: The British oil company BP on Thursday accused its Russian billionaire partners in TNK-BP of trying to wrest control of their joint venture and said the Kremlin was doing nothing to stop them.
lead_paragraph: The British oil company BP on Thursday accused its Russian billionaire partners in TNK-BP of trying to wrest control of their joint venture and said the Kremlin was doing nothing to stop them.

headline.main: BP Accuses Russian Venture Partners of Corporate Raiding
